attributes.action: STOP the Snowley park / Glenfields housing development
attributes.additional_details:
We need to stop the proposed housing development to build 150 homes on the open space north of Snowley Park & Glenfields, Whittlesy, Cambridgeshire.
This is land used by the public for recreation & has become recognised by the community as a nature reserve.
Situated on the edge of a flood plain it carry's a high risk of flooding. The local road network wont be able to support this development & the quality of life will be greatly reduced for many of the residents of Whittlesey.
Please help us stop this housing development before yet more of our countryside disappears.
